metadata.title: Bachacode Developers | Web Development & Consulting
metadata.description: Bachacode Developers specializes in custom web development, offering static sites, web applications and WordPress, tailored to your needs.
metadata.keywords: development, programming, wordpress, php, laravel, support

not_found.title: Page not found

hero.title: We build amazing <websites>websites</websites> for small businesses
hero.subtitle: with us your new project will become a reality

about.title: Connecting the Future: Our Story in the World of Technology.
about.body:
We are a team of web development experts dedicated to creating custom digital solutions that fit your needs, budget and technical knowledge. We specialize in delivering accessible and functional web applications, either developing sites from scratch or improving existing projects.

We take care of bringing your next online project to life, making sure every detail is aligned with your goals and vision.

services.title: what do we <keyword>offer</keyword> you?
services.subtitle: Services accessible to all our customers

static.title: Static Websites
static.body: Custom website development with static content, ideal for small projects that do not require frequent updates, such as landing pages, portfolios or catalogs. These sites offer speed, security and efficiency for stable content.

wordpress.title: WordPress Websites
wordpress.body: Website development with WordPress, providing full control of the content without the need to touch code. Ideal for medium-sized projects such as blogs, portfolios or corporate sites, offering flexibility, scalability and easy customization.

web-apps.title: Web Applications
web-apps.body: Custom web application development with advanced functionalities, such as online payment integration, personalized recommendation systems, live chat, real-time data analysis and content management. Perfect for medium to large projects, such as online stores, educational platforms, online booking systems, news portals, and business management systems (ERP, CRM).

consulting.title: Web Consulting
consulting.body: If you want to add new functionalities or update your current project, we'll take care of planning the entire process for you. From time estimation to budget creation, we'll offer solutions using the technologies we know best, guaranteeing an efficient development according to your needs.

support.title: Web Support
support.body: When it comes to your existing project, we can help you with web support and correct any errors you find. We'll plan out the whole process, offering solutions in the technologies we know best to ensure the development is efficient and meets your specific needs.

optimization.title: Website Optimization
optimization.body: When it comes to your existing project, we can help you with web support and correct any errors you find. We'll plan out the whole process, offering solutions in the technologies we know best to ensure the development is efficient and meets your specific needs.

technologies.title: Our <keyword>technologies</keyword>
technologies.subtitle: We are experts in state-of-the-art web development technology

clients.title: Our <keyword>Clients</keyword>
clients.subtitle: Those who have placed their trust in us

tailor.name: Guillermo Saez
tailor.body: With Bachacode Developers I found what many entrepreneurs are looking for and never find: The peace of mind of being able to leave your business in the hands of people who take care of it and help it grow with solutions that border on excellence. They provide ideas and are 100% involved with each project.

mesgo.name: Luis Fernando Carbajal
mesgo.body: Thanks to Bachacode Developers we were able to meet the requirements established by CBI Group to obtain our supplier number. The website they developed not only exceeded our expectations, but also facilitated the process and the presentation of our company.

team.title: We <keyword>guarantee</keyword>
team.subtitle: What you will get by working with us

development.title: Agile development
development.body: With us, agile development means fast adaptation to your needs and constant results. We guarantee efficiency and precise adjustment to what you really need in your project.

communication.title: Communication
communication.body: In our approach, communication is fundamental. We keep channels open for constant and clear interaction with you. We listen to your needs and keep you informed at all times, ensuring that your vision is faithfully reflected in the final project.

prices.title: Adjustable prices
prices.body: We offer flexible pricing to fit your budget without compromising quality. We work together to find the best solution that fits your economic needs.

flexible.title: Flexible features
flexible.body: Our projects are distinguished by their flexibility, adjusting to your evolving needs. Each feature is customizable to ensure your full satisfaction, allowing you to modify the project according to your changing requirements throughout the development until it goes online.

cristhian.name: Cristhian Flores
cristhian.body: Experienced in developing interfaces and APIs with both frontend and backend knowledge.

josibel.name: Josibel Farias
josibel.body: Specializing in creating intuitive and engaging user experiences, with a focus on visual design and usability to ensure efficient and enjoyable interfaces.

hero.title: About <keyword>Bachacode Developers</keyword>
hero.description: At Bachacode Developers, we are dedicated to providing innovative and high quality web development solutions. Our team of experts works tirelessly to ensure the satisfaction of our clients, providing personalized services tailored to the specific needs of each project.

our_values.title: Our <keyword>values</keyword>
our_values.subtitle: Ethics that sets us apart from the competition

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We strive to be at the forefront of technology, implementing innovative solutions that drive our customers' success.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Quality is our priority. We are committed to delivering products and services that exceed our customers' expectations.

commitment.title: Commitment
commitment.description: We are dedicated to building lasting relationships with our clients, based on trust, transparency and mutual commitment.

our_team.title: Our <keyword>team</keyword>
our_team.subtitle: The professionals who will develop your idea

cristhian.name: Cristhian Flores
cristhian.body: Experienced in interface development and design with both frontend and backend knowledge.

josibel.name: Josibel Farias
josibel.body: Specializing in creating intuitive and engaging user experiences, with a focus on visual design and usability to ensure efficient and enjoyable interfaces.

hosting.title: Professional Hosting
hosting.description: You will no longer have to worry about managing your own website, we will do it for you. We offer you a scalable hosting service that adapts to your needs.

design.title: Modern Designs
design.description: We take care of giving your website an attractive design that reflects what your business wants to convey. If you find this page attractive, you will get an equal or superior quality in your project!

security.title: Guaranteed Safety
security.description: Don't take unnecessary risks: our developers will take care of integrating all the necessary security measures to protect your website.

support.title: Effective Support
support.description: We are ready to attend any emergency that requires technical support, we guarantee to keep your website up and running 24 hours a day!

technologies.title: what technologies do we use?
technologies.subtitle: We work with the best technologies for your projects

hosting.title: Let us handle the <keyword>hosting</keyword> of your project
hosting.subtitle: Host your project with us and forget about technical problems

web.title: Web Hosting
web.description: Professional hosting designed for business owners who want secure, reliable, and optimized websites without the technical headaches.

multiple_websites.title: Host up to 5 websites
multiple_websites.description: Host up to 5 websites under one plan — ideal for a main site, landing pages, or an online store.

professional_email.title: Custom business email
professional_email.description: Get a custom email address with your domain name (you@yourbusiness.com) to look professional and trustworthy.

custom_php.title: PHP & HTML Support
custom_php.description: Support for HTML static websites and PHP applications, including WordPress

team_access.title: Secure team access
team_access.description: Grant secure access to employees or partners without sharing sensitive login details.

cloud.title: Cloud Hosting
cloud.description: Flexible and scalable hosting that combines the power of dedicated resources with the reliability of the cloud. Ideal for businesses that need consistent performance.

dedicated_resources.title: Dedicated resources
dedicated_resources.description: Guaranteed CPU, RAM, and storage reserved for your websites without sharing with other users.

auto_scaling.title: Automatic scaling
auto_scaling.description: Your hosting resources automatically scale up or down to handle traffic spikes or business growth.

flexible_stack.title: Flexible app stack
flexible_stack.description: Run different applications and frameworks beyond WordPress, including custom stacks tailored to your project.

high_concurrency.title: Handles high traffic
high_concurrency.description: Serve large numbers of visitors and transactions at the same time without losing performance.

hero.title: Successful <keyword>websites</keyword> we have made

projects.subtitle: Websites that we have built or improved to get more clients to their businesses

hero.subtitle: Are you ready to take your business online? We're here to help you create a professional website.

info_section.title: need more ways to reach us?
info_section.subtitle: find our contact details below — we respond quickly!

whatsapp.title: Send us a message with WhatsApp
whatsapp.message: I'm interested in working with you to make a project or improve a current one.

quick_response.title: Quick response time
quick_response.message: We value your time and strive to respond as quickly as possible. Our team is committed to providing clear, helpful answers within hours, not days. Whether you have a simple question or a detailed request, you can count on us for fast, reliable communication every time.

includes.title: Includes
includes.ssl: Free SSL at no additional cost

contact_section.body: We believe in making possible any project our clients have in mind, are you interested in building your online presence? <keyword>Work with us.</keyword>
